title: Simultaneous multi-telescope observations of FRB 121102
comment: 介绍了在2019年9月10日对处于活跃状态的FRB 121102（z~0.2）进行的约3小时的11次探测

title: Gamma-ray emission revealed at the western edge of SNR G344.7-0.1
comment: 研究了最近用Fermi/LAT在50GeV以上能段探测到的系内伽玛射线源2FHL J1703.4-4145的情况

title: Evidence of a Type Ia Progenitor for Supernova Remnant 3C 397m
comment: 这篇文章讨论了年轻的超新星遗迹 SNR 3C 397的爆炸起源

title: Optical studies of two stripped envelope supernovae SN 2015ap (Type Ib) and SN 2016P (Type Ic)
comment: 本文对Ib型超新星SN 2015ap和Ic型超新星SN 2016P进行了测光和测谱研究

title: Lyman continuum leakage in faint star-forming galaxies at redshift z=3-3.5 probed by gamma-ray bursts
comment: 文章展示了对z=3.5055的GRB 191004B余辉光谱中的LyC发射的观测情况

title: Fallback Rates from Partial Tidal Disruption Events
comment: 本文讨论了局部潮汐瓦解事件（partial TDE）的回落率的问题

title: Combined Limit on the Photon Mass with Nine Localized Fast Radio Bursts
comment: 文章提出光子的非零质量假设会产生与频率相关的光色散，导致来自给定暂现源的不同频率光子的到达时间差异.本文使用九个测量了红移的FRBs，推到出$m_γ ≤ 7.1×10^{−51}kg$
